entry.title: IT Talks #9: Web Performance with Martin Chaov

link.title: IT Talks #9: Web Performance with Martin Chaov

entry.content:
IT Talks #9: Web Performance with Martin Chaov

In the 9th episode it will be discussed the following topics:

  • What is web performance?
  • How do we measure performance?
  • Which set of metrics should we look to track our performance?
  • What is the difference between performance and perceived performance?
  • How do we establish a performance culture?
You can check all the resources in the episode page here.
entry.summary: IT Talks #9: Web Performance with Martin Chaov In the 9th episode it will be discussed the following topics:

–ù—è–∫–æ–∏ –æ—Ç –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω–∏—Ç–µ —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–∏, –∫–æ–∏—Ç–æ –í–∏–∫—Ç–æ—Ä —Å–ø–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏ –ø–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ –Ω–∞ –µ–ø–∏–∑–æ–¥–∞: Mail lists: Daily dev/IT: https://www.codeproject.com/ Kotlin weekly news: http://www.kotlinweekly.net/ Linux weekly news: https://ma.ttias.be/cronweekly/

entry.title: Freelance from A-Z
entry.content:
Freelance from A-Z

YBC Future Skills

The second event of YBC Future Skills is here and guess who is the lecturer. We will talk about freelancing - what are good and bad parts, how to start, how to build your brand, website and social media profiles, how to get clients and have good relationships with them and how to turn your freelance career into successful business.

Main points

1. The Freelancing Dream
  • The Good Part
  • The Bad Part
  • Your Freelancing Journey
2. Setup
  • Brand
  • Website (2 hosting coupon gifts)
  • Social Media
  • Portfolio
3. Getting Clients
  • What clients need?
  • Freelancing platforms
4. Everything Else
  • Project Management
  • Client Relationships
  • Pricing, Finances and Money

If you are interested see more for the event here.


Presentation - Antonia



Presentation - Martin

entry.title: WordPress for Teachers
entry.content:
WordPress Basics for Teachers

SoftUni Foundation

At the end of September we launched the next free course from SoftUni Foundation in support of IT teachers in Bulgaria üéì The training was intended to introduce them WordPress and how to create simple websites using this popular software. üë®üè´

It‚Äôs great to support the teachers who teach the children of Bulgaria. It‚Äôs great to give not only knowledge, but well-developed learning content with presentations, exercises and planned graduation classes.

For us accessible education will always be a cause that we support and develop!
entry.summary: WordPress Basics for Teachers SoftUni Foundation

entry.title: Intro to HTML and CSS
entry.content:
Introduction to HTML and CSS

SoftUni

This January we are preparing one special crash course - Introduction to HTML and CSS. The course will introduce the technologies and will finish with workshop - How to build a landing page? The course starts in 7th January and will be free. You can find more info at softuni.bg

Introduction to HTML - Presentation


Introduction to CSS - Presentation
entry.summary: Introduction to HTML and CSS SoftUni
